thread.title: Assured Guaranty Ltd. Raises Quarterly Dividend by Over 12% to $0.16 per Common Share

author: cnbc.com
title: Assured Guaranty Ltd. Raises Quarterly Dividend by Over 12% to $0.16 per Common Share
text:
Dividend Increased for Seventh Consecutive Year
HAMILTON, Bermuda--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Assured Guaranty Ltd. (NYSE:AGO) today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.16 per common share, an increase of over 12% from the quarterly dividend of $0.1425 per common share that was declared on November 1, 2017.
Assured Guaranty has raised its quarterly dividend for seven consecutive years, bringing the total increase to 256% since its November 2011 dividend payment of $0.045 per common share.
The dividend is payable on March 21, 2018 to shareholders of record at the close of business on March 7, 2018.
Assured Guaranty Ltd. is a publicly traded Bermuda-based holding company. Its operating subsidiaries provide credit enhancement products to the U.S. and international public finance, infrastructure and structured finance markets. More information on Assured Guaranty and its subsidiaries can be found at AssuredGuaranty.com .
View source version on businesswire.com : http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180221005639/en/
